plot: The Volari have come to take over the Universe. Geron and Cassandra return to Earth from another world to gather up their children who have been hidden in safe homes to be raised by humans ...
title: Into the Shadows
plot_es: The Volari have come to take over the Universe. Geron and Cassandra return to Earth from another world to gather up their children who have been hidden in safe homes to be raised by humans ...
plot_en: The Volari have come to take over the Universe. Geron and Cassandra return to Earth from another world to gather up their children who have been hidden in safe homes to be raised by humans ...
